description: The office gets a huge box delivered by hunky delivery guy Massimo (Matt). Alexander (Michael) is pissed to hear that it is the oversized prototype for his dildo. Massimo sticks around for the signature and reveals to Alexander his ambition to be a porn star. Alexander auditions him on the office table with a heavy suck and fuck session that includes a "helicopter" spin. They negotiate an exclusive model contract right before their nuts burst in orgasm.
title: Michael Lucas and Matt Cole
